data.text:
Would you like to go to tonight's 
fireworks festival with me?
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

data.text:
It was early afternoon in the middle of our summer 
training camp, when Mihono Bourbon came up to me 
and asked that question.

I was surprised by her sudden request. That's a first! 
I immediately took her up on her offer without a second 
thought. And so...

According to my research, there are usually around 
70,000 attendees. There are around 90 different stalls, 
among which are 9 types of games to play.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

data.text:
What would you like to do? There is shooting, die cutting, 
goldfish scooping, yo-yo fishing, ring tossing, a lottery, 
string pulling, box punching and melon splitting.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

data.text:
Inviting me out and doing so much research 
beforehand... The usually reserved Mihono Bourbon 
is exploding with enthusiasm today.

Incorrect. 'Love' is not it. Neither is 'hate.' My feelings 
toward festivals can be quantified as 'normal.'
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

choices.text: Why are you so enthusiastic, then?

data.text:
...... 
I am merely increasing the time interacting with you 
by spending 'a fun time' with you, Master.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

data.text:
I just... I have always understood social interactions 
to be 'meaningless.'
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

data.text: But... Perhaps my understanding was wrong.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

data.text:
I'm surprised to hear her speak less formal. 
From the corner of my eye, I spotted the head of 
a bunny plush sticking out of her pocket.
It was the bunny we won at the arcade the other day.
It helps me remember the feeling of 'fun.'
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

data.text:
It helps my motivation stay up during training and 
studying. I never expected it to have such an effect...
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

data.text: So I was thinking... That maybe the 'fun' you helped me experience back then really does have meaning...
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

data.text: Maybe my parents' order to improve my social skills...
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

data.text:
Were perhaps supposed to be... 
Interpreted a little... softer than that.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

data.text:
I'm speechless at her personal growth. She combined her 
experiences like a puzzle to reach the conclusion on her 
own, even if things didn't always work out right away.

I pulled myself together and take the flustered 
Mihono Bourbon towards the crowded festival.

Rotate the muzzle 5 degrees downwards. 
Too far, move it slightly upwards. That's it.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

data.text: *bang*

Wow, you got it! 
You're a natural, my man!
data.name: Shooting Gallery Attendant

data.text:
Wow, you got it! 
You're a natural, m'lady!
data.name: Shooting Gallery Attendant

data.text:
Hahaha! I see, you two make a perfect pair! 
Here's the prize, you lovely horse girl. Don't lose it!
data.name: Shooting Gallery Attendant

data.text:
...... 
Thank you very much.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

data.text:
We enjoyed the festival to our heart's content and the 
evening whizzed by in a flash. We went die cutting, 
ring throwing and drew in the lottery.

The fireworks are about to start. We should move 
towards a good vantage point.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

data.text: Oh, Bourbon?
data.name: Honest Horsegirl

data.text:
We ran into the horse girl that came up to Bourbon 
some time ago.
I concluded that you must have some sort of reason to reach out to me during my break.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

data.text: Sorry, I didn't have a particular reason, I just wanted to chat for a bit... I guess I interrupted you after all, so I'll be going!
data.name: Honest Horsegirl

data.text:
I didn't know you went to festivals, Bourbon... Oh wait, 
I-I'm sorry for interrupting your free time! I got a little 
too excited...
data.name: Honest Horsegirl

data.text:
Don't feel sorry, it's no problem. 
You are here to see the fireworks, too?
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

data.text:
The centerpiece of this fireworks display 
is a shell 90 centimeters in diameter. 
I am looking forward to it.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

data.text: So, do you have a reason for that?
data.name: Honest Horsegirl

data.text: No, not in particular.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

data.text: Huh?
data.name: Honest Horsegirl

data.text:
The little horse girl seemed in shock after 
hearing those words come from Bourbon.

Mihono Bourbon has come a long way. She finally 
understands what it's like to 'have fun' with others. 
...Wait a minute.
But...
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

data.text: Order accepted.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

data.text: She turned her gaze to the younger horse girl.
Would you like to... Watch the fireworks with me?
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

data.text: *fweet* ... *boom*

Wow, the fireworks really are amazing! 
I'm glad I worked up the courage to go here alone.
data.name: Honest Horsegirl

data.text:
I'm so glad I met you here, to see the fireworks together... 
Oh, I'm sorry. I started speaking my thoughts again...
data.name: Honest Horsegirl

data.text: Do you like fireworks?
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

data.text:
Yes, I do! I like how they sparkle so wide in the sky. 
They inspire me! Everyone longs for something that 
they don't have. Be it fireworks or something else.
data.name: Honest Horsegirl

data.text:
I know this sounds as an excuse for what I did back then, 
but I'm bad at sensing the distance between people...
data.name: Honest Horsegirl

data.text:
Understood. So you have trouble measuring distances? 
I'm actually an expert at this subject.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

data.text:
For example: The two of us are 34 centimeters apart. 
The shaved ice stand behind us at 4 o'clock is 8 meters 
and 24 centimeters away from you.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

data.text: Um, Bourbon. Are you a bit of an airhead, actually?
data.name: Honest Horsegirl

data.text: My head is filled with gray matter only, not air.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

data.text: Yep! An airhead!
data.name: Honest Horsegirl

data.text:
...They continued chatting for a while, 
under the twinkling lights of the fireworks.
The next day.

Hi Father. It's me, Mihono Bourbon. I'm calling 
to report on the completion of your ordeâ€”
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

data.text: No, sorry. This is a status report.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

data.text: I managed to make a friend.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
